about_the_game:
Only you stand between Moscow and the Crimean army. It's the 16th century. Your task is to protect Russian lands! Hurry up to prepare the southern borders of Rus' for an enemy attack. How to do it?

- Solve numerous puzzles. Reveal the enemy's plan, show courage and ingenuity and turn the tide of the battle!

— Develop defensive tactics with the defenders of the Epifansky fort! Can you quickly load an ancient arquebus in the heat of battle?

- Find the enemy’s weak point and strike! Shoot accurately and quickly, there will be no second chance.

"The Gates of the Kulikovo Field. The Battle of Epifan" is a VR reconstruction created jointly with leading Russian historians. How was a 16th century gun loaded? What did the defenders of the southern borders of Rus' look like? How did you fight back a ruthless enemy? Become time travelers and get answers to these questions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Rift S . Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Rift S . Standing or Room Scale

short_description: Find yourself in the center of a decisive battle for Russian lands. You are a 16th century Sagittarius. Repel the Crimean army, show valor and ingenuity in battle. Whether the enemy reaches Moscow or not depends on you!
supported_languages:
English, Russian*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
